name: What's for dinner
description: a web page using api calls to find whats for dinner, what to drink, and tell a joke.
technologies: Made with:  HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Ajax, and GitHub Pages.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: a web page that uses api calls to find the weather of the city and tell you the 5 day forcaste.
technologies: Made with:  HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, OpenWeather API, Moment.js, and GitHub Pages.

name: Day planner
description: a web page to help schedule your work day by the hour with color coding to tell you past, present, and future events
technologies: Made with:  HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, and GitHub Pages.

name: burger logger
description: a web page that uses MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars, and ORM to create a fun web page to log and list different hamburgers.
technologies: Made with:  HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Express, mySQL, Handlebars, Node.js, and Heroku.

name: Gaming Dashboard
description: a web page where the user can store and edit their reviews of gaming. As well as see other users reviews of games.
technologies: Made with:  HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Express, mySQL, Handlebars, Node.js, and Heroku.
